repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:15.10 
MAINTAINER Bogdan Popa <bogdan@defn.io> 

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y build-essential libgmp-dev libssl-dev mlton && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD http://www.impredicative.com/ur/urweb-20151122.tgz /tmp/urweb-20151122.tgz 
RUN tar xzf /tmp/urweb-20151122.tgz && rm /tmp/urweb-20151122.tgz
RUN rm /tmp/urweb-20151122.tgz 
RUN mv urweb-20151122 /urweb 

WORKDIR /urweb 
RUN ./configure --build="$(dpkg-architecture --query DEB_BUILD_GNU_TYPE)" && make && make install

RUN mkdir /app 
WORKDIR /app 
VOLUME /app
